text: Mildred Gale, born Mildred Warner () was the spouse (wife) of Lawrence Washington. He was the paternal grandfather of George Washington. After her husband died in February 1698, she had to raise her children all alone, and thus became a single parent (mother). She herself died on . Category:1671 births Category:1701 births Category:People from Virginia Category:George Washington
title: Mildred Gale
